title: Replace decorative pig plushies with 5 different user-provided pig images (top-only placement)

requirements.text: Replace the existing decorative pig plushie images in frontend/src/components/valentine/ValentineQuestionCard.tsx so that there are exactly 5 decorative pig plushies, all positioned at the top area of the card content (no pig plushies placed near the bottom).

quotes: Keep them in the top, keep 5 different ones

acceptanceCriteria: The question card renders exactly 5 decorative pig plushie images.
All 5 pig plushies are positioned in the top area (e.g., top-left/top-right/top-center region) and none appear at the bottom of the card.
No other parts of the UI (text, buttons, seal, bouquet) are removed or functionally changed.

requirements.text: Stop using /assets/generated/pig-plushie.dim_256x256.png for the decorative pig plushies, and instead use 5 different pig images sourced from the user-provided images/links (deduplicate identical uploads so the 5 displayed are visually different).

quotes: Keep them in the top, keep 5 different ones
I did not like current pig images, replace with above

acceptanceCriteria: None of the decorative pig elements in ValentineQuestionCard.tsx reference /assets/generated/pig-plushie.dim_256x256.png anymore.
The 5 decorative pigs displayed are visually different from each other (do not count duplicate uploads as separate).

requirements.text: Add the user-provided pig plushie images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from ValentineQuestionCard.tsx (do not hotlink external URLs at runtime). Use the two user-provided URLs as source material to create local static assets.
acceptanceCriteria: All pig plushie images used by ValentineQuestionCard.tsx are served from /assets/generated/* and exist in frontend/public/assets/generated.
No decorative pig image uses an external URL in its src attribute.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be modified: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep the app as a single-page Valentine experience; do not introduce new flows unrelated to replacing the pig plushie images.
nonGoals: Do not change the romantic message text, question text, or Yes/No state copy.
Do not add backend functionality (no Motoko changes required for this request).
Do not change the seal image (/assets/generated/love-seal-infinity-stamp.dim_256x256.png) or bouquet image usage.

required: Pig plushie photo cutout (transparent background), bunny-hood pig holding a drink (pig-plushie-bunny.dim_256x256.png)
Pig plushie photo cutout (transparent background), small winged/angel pig sitting (pig-plushie-angel.dim_256x256.png)
Pig plushie photo cutout (transparent background), stacked pig plushies (pig-plushie-stack.dim_256x256.png)
Pig plushie photo cutout (transparent background), close-up chubby pig under blanket (pig-plushie-blanket.dim_256x256.png)
Pig plushie photo cutout (transparent background), angel/kawaii pig variant sourced from provided external image (pig-plushie-external-1.dim_256x256.png)
